lang.UI_trait_actionherodesc:
You live for the thick of the fight.
You deal only half as much normal damage, but you deal extra damage and have more critical chance the more enemies there are around you.
Your damage and critical chance scale based on number and distance of zombies around you.
lang.UI_trait_albinodesc:
You've always had extreme sunlight sensitivity.
While outside and in daylight, you experience progressive head pain.
Hold an umbrella to reduce pain.
lang.UI_trait_amputeedesc:
One of your arms was amputated a long time ago.
You can not equip anything to your secondary, nor utilize your secondary arm for anything.
Your left arm can not be injured, and wounds that would otherwise be placed there are simply ignored.
lang.UI_trait_anemicdesc: You bleed much more rapidly from wounds.
lang.UI_trait_antigundesc:
You protest against guns and have no experience with them, making you worse at using them than others.
You take longer to aim, can not shoot far and become sad while using guns.
You receive 25% less aiming XP.
lang.UI_trait_antiquedesc:
You know how to recognize an antique item when you see it.
You have a rare chance to find unique variants of items while searching industrial containers.
+1 Scavenging if Scavenging Skill mod enabled
lang.UI_trait_asceticdesc:
You prefer to abstain from the unnecessary pleasures of the body and find spiritual fulfillment in simple things.
You dislike cooked food.
Pre-Packaged foods give no mood boost.
Uncooked Meals are neutral.
Very high chance to burn meals.
lang.UI_trait_badteethdesc:
You never took much care of your dental health.
When consuming food, you may experience pain. Larger portions cause more pain.
lang.UI_trait_batteringramdesc:
You know how to force your way through crowds like a professional football player.
While Sprinting (not running), you knockdown zombies in your path.
Every zombie you knockdown depletes some endurance depending upon your Fitness level, so be careful charging into large crowds, as this may leave you exhausted.
Note: This trait overrides the Spear's charge ability.
lang.UI_trait_bladetwirldesc:
You never thought all that swordplay would have practical use.
+1 Long Blade
+1 Short Blade
lang.UI_trait_blissfuldesc:
You have a positive outlook at all times.
You regain happiness at an increased rate.
lang.UI_trait_blunttwirldesc:
Sure, you've capped a few knees in your time. That experience could prove useful.
+1 Long Blunt
+1 Short Blunt
lang.UI_trait_bouncerdesc:
You've roughed people up now and again.
+1 Strength
+1 Short Blunt
Whenever you are surrounded by two or more zombies,
you will automatically attempt to push them away.
lang.UI_trait_brokedesc:
Ouch! You start with a broken leg, a severely debilitating injury.
Note: Your leg will be splinted.
lang.UI_trait_burneddesc:
You had a traumatic experience with fire that affected you both physically and mentally.
You start out covered in bandaged burns on every part of your body.
Observing fire gives you panic and anxiety, this effect scales based on the distance between you and the fire.
Prevents you from throwing fire bombs, molotov cocktails and starting any kind of fire.
lang.UI_trait_butterfingersdesc:
You may sometimes drop something you are holding.
Chance is based on carry weight and other traits such as luck or dextrous.
lang.UI_trait_depressivedesc:
You're prone to bouts of sadness.
You occassionally become sad. While depressed, sadness stacks until removed.
lang.UI_trait_depriveddesc: You begin the game with absolutely nothing - not even clothes!
lang.UI_trait_drinkerdesc:
You have a dependence on alcohol. If you go too long without alcohol, you'll begin to feel stressed, then pain, and eventually withdrawal.
If you go through withdrawal, you will grow progressively more sick until you drink again or die. 
You begin the game with one bottle of whiskey - better find more booze soon.
lang.UI_trait_evasivedesc:
You're agile.
You have a 33% chance to dodge any incoming attack.
When dodged, you have no hit animation.
+1 Nimble
lang.UI_trait_expertdriverdesc:
You drive cars much more effectively.
Vehicles move faster, make less noise, and handle more efficiently.
lang.UI_trait_fastdesc:
You were always quick on your feet.
You move 15% more quickly.
lang.UI_trait_fearfuldesc: You're easily scared and likely to scream aloud if panicked.
lang.UI_trait_fitteddesc: Worn clothing weighs half as much and does not impose any speed penalty.
lang.UI_trait_generatordesc: You know how to operate a generator.
lang.UI_trait_gimpdesc:
You've always been the last in line.
You move 15% more slowly.
lang.UI_trait_glassbodydesc:
You're particularly vulnerable and frail.
You take twice as much damage from all sources.
You become easily scratched from minor injuries.
Even a short fall or moderate damage can result in a broken bone.
Heavy Encumberance can result in severe damage.
lang.UI_trait_gordanitedesc:
You are adept at using crowbars as weapons.
Your attacks with crowbars have a higher critical hit chance as well as increased base damage.
+1 Long Blunt
Effect scales with Long Blunt skill.
lang.UI_trait_gourmanddesc:
You delight in food of all kinds and find cooking an enjoyable sport.
Food cooks in half the time and takes twice as long to burn.
More likely to find Fresh ingredients.
Food that you cook is better.
Temperature of food and method of cooking does not bother you.
+1 Cooking
lang.UI_trait_graverobberdesc:
While others find it difficult, you have no qualms pilfering the remains of the dead.
You are more likely to find loot on zombie corpses.
+1 Scavenging if Scavenging Skill mod enabled
lang.UI_trait_gruntdesc:
You worked some odd-jobs here and there.
+1 Carpentry
+1 Short Blunt
lang.UI_trait_gunspecialistdesc:
Begin the game with advanced knowledge of guns.
+2 Aiming
+2 Reloading
lang.UI_trait_gymgoerdesc:
You enjoy working out.
Exercise is twice as effective for you.
Exercise Fatigue lasts half the time than usual.
+1 Fitness
+1 Strength
lang.UI_trait_hardydesc:
Whether by force of will or physical fitness, you're not one to tire after long hours working.
Your maximum endurance is increased by 25%
lang.UI_trait_idealweightdesc:
You like to keep your weight in check.
You gain 1.5x calories when under 78 weight.
You gain 0.75x calories when above 82 weight.
lang.UI_trait_immunocompromiseddesc:
Your immune system is vulnerable to infection.
Your wounds tend to become infected.
You have a 25% greater chance to become zombified
Note: This trait will still let you be infected by zombie injuries, even if you disable transmission in the sandbox.
lang.UI_trait_incomprehensivedesc:
You're not as thorough as most.
You tend to find less items while searching containers.
lang.UI_trait_indefatigabledesc:
You're one hard person to kill. Whenever you are reduced below 15% HP or dragged down, you are healed to full HP.
This effect may only occur once per character and it cures zombification.
Note: This does not heal injuries caused by Injured or Broke Leg.
lang.UI_trait_ingenuitivedesc:
You have a knack for figuring things out.
You automatically know all recipes that would otherwise require a magazine or professional knowledge.
(This also includes recipes added by mods.)
lang.UI_trait_injureddesc:
You begin the game with moderate injuries.
Note: You won't start with zombification and your wounds are bandaged.
lang.UI_trait_leadfootdesc:
You've always had a heavy step and now it's time to put your foot down - on some zombies.
Your stomps are considerably more powerful.
lang.UI_trait_martialdesc:
You've practiced martial arts and are versed at self-defense.
+1 Fitness
+1 Short Blunt
Your bare-handed attacks deal damage.
Damage scales with Short Blunt skill.
lang.UI_trait_motionsicknessdesc:
You gain sickness while driving.
The amount of sickness gained depends on vehicle's speed.
lang.UI_trait_mundanedesc:
Your weapon attacks will never critically hit.
This includes any critical bonuses from traits such as Prowess.
Any other damage bonuses still apply properly.
lang.UI_trait_naturaldesc:
You've never liked all the preservatives in foods, opting instead for natural foods.
+1 Cooking
+1 Foraging
lang.UI_trait_noodlelegsdesc:
You constantly tripped when going out for morning jogs.
Chance to trip when running and sprinting.
Chance decreases based on your sprinting and nimble level.
lang.UI_trait_noxpaxedesc:
You chopped some trees from time to time.
+2 Axe
+1 Carpentry
You do not gain XP multiplier by this trait.
The bonus Axe and Carpentry level does not show in character creation menu.
lang.UI_trait_noxpfirstaiddesc:
You took first aid lessons to hopefully save someone else's life.
+3 First Aid
You do not gain XP multiplier by this trait.
The bonus First Aid level does not show in character creation menu.
lang.UI_trait_noxpmaintenancedesc:
You took maintenance lessons to make your tools last longer.
+2 Maintenance
You do not gain XP multiplier by this trait.
The bonus Maintenance level does not show in character creation menu.
lang.UI_trait_noxpshooterdesc:
You went out to the shooting range during your free time.
+2 Aiming
You do not gain XP multiplier by this trait.
The bonus Aiming level does not show in character creation menu.
lang.UI_trait_noxpsneakydesc:
You were a champion in hide and seek while playing with your friends.
+2 Sneaking
+1 Lightfooted
You do not gain XP multiplier by this trait.
The bonus Sneaking and Lightfooted level does not show in character creation menu.
lang.UI_trait_noxptechniciandesc:
You took interest in technical things throughout your life.
+1 Mechanics
+2 Electrical
You do not gain XP multiplier by this trait.
The bonus Mechanics and Electrical level does not show in character creation menu.
lang.UI_trait_olympiandesc:
You are or were at one point an Olympic competer whose fitness and speed are a reflection of that.
+1 Sprinting
+1 Fitness
lang.UI_trait_packmousedesc:
You always travel light.
Reduced maximum carrying capacity.
lang.UI_trait_packmuledesc:
You're careful to pack everything you need.
Your maximum carrying capacity is increased.
Strength is more impactful on your carrying capacity.
lang.UI_trait_paranoiadesc:
Periodically, you will get a false scare and panic.
You will need to actively find ways to reduce your stress - it only gets worse after a paranoia attack.
lang.UI_trait_poordriverdesc:
You have limited experience with vehicles.
Vehicles move slowly, make more noise, and handle less efficiently.
lang.UI_trait_preparedammodesc:
You were prepared and stocked-up on ammunition before civilization fell.
You begin the game with a modest amount of various types of ammunition in your inventory.
lang.UI_trait_preparedcampdesc:
Before shit hit the fan, you pulled together some camping supplies.
You begin the game with camping supplies.
lang.UI_trait_preparedcardesc:
You were prepared for the apocalypse and knew you'd need a reliable vehicle.
You begin the game with some car maintenance supplies.
lang.UI_trait_preparedcoordinationdesc:
You took a tourist trip to Kentucky few days prior, and took all the items needed for it.
You begin the game with all maps of major cities, a pencil and a digital watch.
lang.UI_trait_preparedfooddesc:
You were prepared and stocked-up on food before civilization fell.
You begin the game with a stock of food in your inventory.
lang.UI_trait_preparedmedicaldesc:
You were prepared and stocked-up on medical supplies before civilization fell.
You begin the game with a stock of medical supplies in your inventory.
lang.UI_trait_preparedpackdesc:
You were prepared for the inevitable looting that would occur following the apocalypse.
You begin the game with a Regular Hiking Bag.
lang.UI_trait_preparedrepairdesc:
You were prepared and stocked-up on construction supplies before civilization fell.
You begin the game with a stock of construction supplies in your inventory.
lang.UI_trait_preparedweapondesc:
You were prepared and stocked-up on weapons before civilization fell.
You begin the game with a stock of low-level weapons in your inventory.
lang.UI_trait_probladedesc:
You are especially good at wielding Blade weapons.
While wielding these types of weapons, they degrade more slowly, deal 20% more damage,
and have a higher critical chance, which increases based on your skill.
+1 Short Blade
+1 Long Blade
+1 Axe
lang.UI_trait_probluntdesc:
You are especially good at wielding Blunt weapons.
While wielding these types of weapons, they degrade more slowly, deal 20% more damage,
and have a higher critical chance, which increases based on your skill.
+1 Short Blunt
+1 Long Blunt
lang.UI_trait_progundesc:
You are especially good at wielding firearms.
While wielding these types of weapons, they degrade more slowly, and (optionally, sandbox setting) have a chance to not consume ammunition when fired.
Chance is based on your skill level.
+1 Aiming
+1 Reloading
lang.UI_trait_prospeardesc:
You are especially good at wielding Spear weapons.
While wielding these types of weapons, they degrade more slowly, deal 20% more damage,
and have a higher critical chance, which increases based on your skill.
+2 Spear
lang.UI_trait_quickrestdesc:
Your endurance recovery while sitting is doubled.
You are informed if your endurance is max while sitting.
lang.UI_trait_quickworkerdesc:
You have a penchant for expedience in all things.
Your timed actions (such as sawing logs, crafting items, or disassembling furniture) are considerably faster.
lang.UI_trait_quietdesc:
You used to startle your friends and co-workers. Now that innate stealth is paying off.
+1 Sneaking
lang.UI_trait_restfulsleeperdesc:
Fast gain of energy while sleeping.
Suffers no penalties from sleeping on bad furniture or on the ground.
Automatically wakes up when fully rested.
lang.UI_trait_scrapperdesc:
You're good at taking things apart.
+1 Metalworking
+1 Maintenance
Allows you to craft metal sheets and pipes.
lang.UI_trait_scroungerdesc:
You're careful to search every nook and cranny.
You tend to find more items while searching containers.
+1 Scavenging if Scavenging Skill mod enabled
lang.UI_trait_secondwindcooldown: *Second Wind Is No Longer In Cooldown*
lang.UI_trait_secondwinddesc:
You know to push your body to its limits when heading towards danger.
If there are 3 zombies near you while you're exhausted or very tired, gain full endurance and restore fatigue.
Second Wind has a cooldown of 14 days, however it is halved if it didn't recover any fatigue.
+1 Fitness
lang.UI_trait_selfdestructivedesc:
When the going gets tough, you crumble.
While sad, your health begins to decline down to a maximum relative to your unhappiness level.
lang.UI_trait_slowworkerdesc:
Whether because you're lazy or just like to double-check your work, you tend to take longer getting things done.
You perform timed actions (such as sawing logs, crafting items, or disassembling furniture) much more slowly.
lang.UI_trait_specaiddesc:
You are specialized with First Aid.
Your dedication to this specialization limits your access to other skills.
You receive 25% XP from all other sources.
+8 First Aid
Has access to several unique recipes which allow the
improvisation of many medical items.
lang.UI_trait_speccraftingdesc:
You are specialized in all things crafting.
Your dedication to this specialization limits your access to other skills.
You receive 25% XP from all other sources.
+2 Carpentry
+2 Electricity
+2 Metalworking
+2 Mechanics
+2 Tailoring
lang.UI_trait_specfooddesc:
You are specialized in the Kitchen, the Farm. and the Outdoors.
Your dedication to this specialization limits your access to other skills.
You receive 25% XP from all other sources.
+2 Cooking
+2 Farming
+2 Fishing
+2 Foraging
+2 Trapping
lang.UI_trait_specgunsdesc:
You are specialized with the use of all firearms.
Your dedication to this specialization limits your access to other skills.
You receive 25% XP from all other sources.
+4 Aiming
+4 Reloading
lang.UI_trait_specmovedesc:
You are specialized with movement.
Your dedication to this specialization limits your access to other skills.
You receive 25% XP from all other sources.
+2 Sprinting
+2 Lightfooted
+2 Sneak
+2 Nimble
lang.UI_trait_specweaponsdesc:
You are specialized with the use of all melee weapons.
Your dedication to this specialization limits your access to other skills.
You receive 25% XP from all other sources.
+2 Short Blade
+2 Long Blade
+2 Short Blunt
+2 Long Blunt
+2 Axe
+2 Spear
+2 Maintenance
lang.UI_trait_superimmunedesc:
You have an exceptionally strong immune system.
Your wounds can never become infected.
You are completely immune to death by Zombification, however it will take weeks to fully recover from the virus.
lang.UI_trait_tavernbrawlerdesc:
You are more effective at using whatever is available to you as a weapon.
Improvised weapons (such as, but not limited to: Spoons, Forks, Pool Cues, or Frying Pans) are slightly more effective and much less likely to break.
Please note that improvised weapons will never be a good alternative to proper weapons, but this trait makes them more usable as a stopgap.
lang.UI_trait_terminatordesc:
You're all man, no machine, but with firearm in hand, you may as well be a killing machine. Hasta la vista, baby.
25% extra damage from guns.
Doubled aiming speed, increased range, decreased panic and stress when holding a gun.
+3 Aiming, +2 Reloading, +1 Nimble.
You do not gain XP multiplier by this trait. The bonus levels do not show in character creation menu.
lang.UI_trait_thickblooddesc: You bleed more slowly from wounds.
lang.UI_trait_tinkererdesc:
You have a habit of tinkering with things.
+1 Electrical
+1 Mechanics
+1 Tailoring
lang.UI_trait_unwaveringdesc:
Penalty for movement speed from injuries is decreased.
You recover from zombie attacks twice as fast.
lang.UI_trait_vagabonddesc:
You know how to survive on the streets.
You know that there is always something to eat where people would never look, namely the trash.
You tend to find more food items in garbage containers.
Chance affected by luck.
+1 Scavenging if Scavenging Skill mod enabled
lang.UI_trait_wildsmandesc:
You are trained to live off the land.
+1 Fishing
+1 Trapping
+1 Foraging
+1 Spear
You have knowledge of basic stick trap recipes as well as the ability to craft a basic fishing rod.
